title: Signature Galápagos Islands
inclusions_evidence: You'll fly to the Galapagos Islands to embark on a luxury cruise aboard the MC Seaman Journey.

other.notes: The cruise is a significant part of the overall experience.

reasoning: The travel agency deal is significantly cheaper than the DIY option, offering a luxury cruise experience with included flights.
additional_notes: The deal provides a comprehensive experience with activities and meals included.
